    Research experience

    2018 - Present
    Postdoctoral Researcher
    Working with Drs. Erin Sheldon and Anze Slosar. Member of the Dark Energy Survey and the LSST Dark Energy Science Collaboration.

    University of Edinburgh

    Amherst College
    Advisor: Prof. Fulvio Melia

    Service and Outreach

    Publications
